channel.name: CBC News CA
channel.title: The Fifth Estate
channel.desc: Donald Trump's tariff war has people on both sides of the U.S.-Canada border in a panic. From behind the scenes of inauguration day to the oil fields of Alberta - is there a plan behind the chaos? Project 2025 provides the blueprint.
